mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE(MES_NO, MES_CON, SEND_ID, RECV_ID) VALUES((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MES_NO)+1 FROM MESSAGE),#{mesCon},#{sendId},#{recvId})
mapper.select: select mes_no, mes_con, read_check, send_id, recv_id, createAt from message where recv_id=#{recvId} and isshow='Y' ORDER BY createAt desc

select mes_no, mes_con, createAt, read_check, send_id from ( select mes_no, mes_con, read_check, send_id, recv_id,createAt from message where recv_id=#{recvId} and isshow='Y' order by createAt desc ) where mes_no = #{mesNo}
mapper.update: update message set isshow='N' where send_id=#{sendId} and mes_no=#{mesNo}
